data.text:

Accommodations close to Cruise Terminal Canada Place are listed below sorted in the order of their distance (closest first). Explore our favorite hotels to find accommodations near Cruise Terminal Canada Place (Cruise Terminal Canada Place) for your upcoming individual or group travel. We show the best lodging close to Cruise Terminal Canada Place so you can review the available Cruise Terminal Canada Place lodging below and securely reserve your ideal hotel. Booking 5+ Rooms for a group? Save with a Cruise Terminal Canada Place discounted group rate

The Inside Scoop by our Local Expert

Cruise Line Terminal in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada, utilizes the Port of Vancouver, the largest and most diverse port in the country. The port, situated north of the Canadian and American border, is positioned at an ideal site. The deep water does not require dredging and provides a safe port 365 days a year in any weather conditions.The Cruise Line Terminal includes the renowned Vancouver-Alaska cruise, which runs from May to September. The terminal is the gateway for approximately 16 cruise lines, 33 cruise ships, 272 sailings, and over 900,000 passengers. Carnival, Celebrity Cruises, Holland America, Norwegian Cruise Lines, Peace Boat, Princess Cruises, Regent Seven Seas Cruises, Cruise West, Royal Caribbean, and Silverseas are some of the cruise lines. For added convenience, visitors will find snacks and beverages at the Cruise Line Terminal. Both on-site and off-site parking is available as well as short-term baggage storage.Visitors will have their choice of accommodations near the Cruise Line Terminal in Vancouver. Many of the following hotels include complimentary breakfasts, on-site dining options, fitness centers. Many guest rooms are equipped with satellite televisions, hair dryers, wireless Internet, and coffee/tea makers.
